alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Hocking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 2:26AM EDT until April 01 at 3:15AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Fairfield County in central Ohio... Hocking County in central Ohio... * Until 315 AM EDT. * At 226 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Fairfield Beach to 9 miles southeast of Kingston, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Logan, Nelsonville, Baltimore, Bremen, Millersport, Pleasantville, Hocking Hills State Park, Hide-A-Way Hills, Starr, Thurston, Laurelville, Murray City, Sugar Grove, Rushville, West Rushville, Fairfield County Airport, US Route 22 at State Route 159, Ilesboro and Haydenville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
